name: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Nika
description: Allows the user to gain elastic and unique abilities, embodying the 'Warrior of Liberation'.

name: Gomu Gomu no Mi
description: Grants the user a rubber body, allowing for stretching and resilience.

name: Mera Mera no Mi
description: Grants the user the ability to create, control, and transform into fire.

name: Yami Yami no Mi
description: Gives the user the ability to create and manipulate darkness and absorb anything.

name: Gura Gura no Mi
description: Allows the user to create powerful shockwaves, capable of causing earthquakes.

name: Ope Ope no Mi
description: Grants the user the ability to create a 'Room' in which they can manipulate objects freely.

name: Hie Hie no Mi
description: Grants the user the ability to create, control, and transform into ice.

name: Pika Pika no Mi
description: Gives the user the ability to move and attack at the speed of light.

name: Magu Magu no Mi
description: Grants the user the ability to create, control, and transform into magma.

name: Soru Soru no Mi
description: Allows the user to manipulate souls, granting control over lifeless objects.

name: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Seiryu
description: Allows the user to transform into a massive azure dragon with abilities related to fire and flight.

name: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Phoenix
description: Allows the user to transform into a phoenix, gaining regenerative abilities.

name: Ito Ito no Mi
description: Gives the user the ability to create and manipulate strings, capable of controlling others like puppets.

name: Mochi Mochi no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into mochi, a sticky and pliable substance.
